subject: Curling
Rock and Stone
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Ailsa Craig, an uninhabited 200-acre island off the Scottish coast, is the source of a distinctive granite put to use every four years for Olympic curling.
snippet: Ailsa Craig, an uninhabited 200-acre island off the Scottish coast, is the source of a distinctive granite put to use every four years for Olympic curling.
